attributes.action: Remove Patricia Hewitt as Health Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This minister has had more than enough time to re-organise and streamline the management of the NHS. Staff numbers need to be cut in this area as it has become both costly and inwardly political. Hewitt has also become unreasonale in her latet statements.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
